programme.title: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship
programme.desc: BKFC 75 features David Mundell vs Donald Sanchez live from Albuquerque!

programme.desc: Featuring Warren vs. Creer and nine more huge fights from Clearwater, Florida!

programme.desc: Featuring Cochrane vs. Edwards along with eight more huge fights!

programme.title: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Featuring a massive 13-fight card from the fighting city of Manchester.

programme.title: Bare Knuckle Fighting Championship
programme.desc: Karl Thompson vs. Rob Boardman, cruiserweight championship; Pic Jardine vs. Tony Shields, middleweight; James Walker vs. Jan Sulecki, heavyweight. From Walker Activity Dome in Newcastle upon Tyne, England.

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: A series that explores periods of unrivalled domination in sport. Chapters from sport's greatest careers and iconic dynasties.

programme.title: Ultimate Strongman
programme.desc: The Semi Finals of the UK's Strongest Man. Eddie 'The Beast' Hall makes a bid to win a record 6th successive title at the world's toughest strongman event. From Belfast Northern Ireland.

programme.title: Ultimate Strongman
programme.desc: The Final of the UK's Strongest Man. Eddie 'The Beast' Hall makes a bid to win a record 6th successive title at the world's toughest strongman event. From Belfast Northern Ireland.

programme.title: Ultimate Strongman
programme.desc: The Quarter Finals of the UK's Strongest Man. Features Laurence Shahlaei and Tom Stoltman. From Belfast Northern Ireland.

programme.title: Ultimate Strongman
programme.desc: The Semi Finals of the UK's Strongest Man. The final 12 athletes slug it out for a place in the Final. From Belfast Northern Ireland.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Battle in the Gateway to the West
programme.desc: In three epic clashes, JOSH KREJCI welcomes NATE MORROW to the Squared Circle,TOMMY STRYDOM takes on COREY ROBERTS and BOBBY TAYLOR goes to war with RYAN ROBERTS. Don't miss these incredible showings of toughness from Omaha!

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Prospects throw down in a handful of first-time showings in Denver with RAMIRO FIGUEROA vs BRETT HUDSON and JOSH HUBER vs ANDREW YATES. Also, in BKFC veteran matchups, CRISTINA CRIST, CASSIE ROBB, SAWYER DEPEE and KEEGAN VANDERMEER match up.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Watch some serious showings of toughness and skill asJOSEPH CREER vs DANIEL MITCHELL,ZEB VINCENT vs CASEY MOSES,DERRICK FINDLEY vs SERGIO LOPEZ &DYLAN SCHULTE vs ROBERTO ARMAS lay it all on the line in Denver.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Three titles are on the line in Hollywood, Florida with WARREN vs ESCOBOZA fighting for light heavyweight gold, BLAS vsRICHARDSON battling at bantamweight and bad blood boils over as BRYAN DURAN comes for KAI STEWART'S featherweight strap!

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: In a showcase of incredible bare-knuckle matchmaking,LEONARDO PERDOMO vs LEO BERCIER,GEE PEREZ vs ALBERT INCLAN,CHRISTINE VICENS vs MELANIE SHAH &JUSTIN IBARROLA vs RICK CARUSO demonstrate the grittiness of BKFC.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: In four tough-fought wars, we see none of these bouts go the distance! Watch BKFC talent battle with SIMPSON vs SUAREZ,ZUCKERMAN vs CEDENO,PLAZAOLA vs DODSON &GARCIA vs LIVINGSTON at BKFC 62.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: In an absolutely electric showing for the BKFC debut at the Pechanga Resort & Casino,VICTOR ROSAS vs LUIS INIGUEZ,FERNANDO GONZALEZ vs RODNEY THOMAS &RUBEN WARR vs ROBBIE PERALTA shock the crowd with jaw-dropping scraps!

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Watch exceptional matchups & brutal finishes from Pechanga's first ever BKFC Fight Night! Featuring HANSEN vs YOST,VO vs PETTIT,GUTIERREZ vs GARCIA &VILLASENOR vs FIELDS.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: California goes CRAZY for Bare Knuckle
programme.desc: Not a single fight from Pechanga disappointed the live audience, nor the viewers at home! Watch some of BKFC's warriors toe the line in. Featuring JORDAN CHRISTENSEN vs RILEY PELLEGRINO,JOSEPH WHITE vs CALEB AVILA &SQUIRE REDFERN vs RICHARD BROOKS.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.sub-title: Big Brawls at the Sturgis Bike Week!
programme.desc: In a truly historic event at the annual Sturgis Motorcycle Rally, fighters toe the line in a rare outdoor setting in front of the largest BKFC in-person attendance! BRITAIN HART and TAYLOR STARLING fight for strawweight gold.

programme.title: BKFC: Knuckle Up
programme.desc: Knuckle Up delivers another night of bare-knuckle intensity, featuring explosive matchups: Andrew Strode vs. Tyler Randall, Parker Porter vs. Chase Gormley, Yorgan De Castro vs. Bobby Brents, and Rico DiSciullo vs. Anthony Foye.
